name: Home, sweet home
description:
This one is not for my mother but for me, as a mother.
Art can be naked. Raw. This one hurts me in ways you’ll never know. I made this sketch 10 years ago when I was struggling with being a single mother and struggling with motherhood.
I wasn’t ready to be a mother and I had a terrible relationship with my parents. I still do.
I used to look at this Klimt painting (The three ages of woman) to remind myself of the beauty of motherhood.
